Title: Email
Blurb: All staff, students and postgraduates are entitled to a University email account.

Title: Wi-Fi and wired internet
Blurb: eduroam is the main wireless network for staff, associates and students.

Title: Printing
Blurb: The UoN Print Service is available in all libraries and most computer rooms.

Title: Office 365
Blurb: Office 365 suite of applications and productivity services for all staff and students.

Title: Software
Blurb: A range of up-to-date software to support staff and students in their work, studies or research.

Title: IT accounts and passwords
Blurb: Key information about your IT account including how to access Wi-Fi, email, make calls and work remotely on and off campus.

Title: Working off campus
Blurb: Ways to access your University data, systems and applications remotely and when to use them.

Title: Filestore
Blurb: The University offers file storage solutions for students, staff and researchers.

Title: MyNottingham app
Blurb: Access to timetables, maps, programme materials and guides,  all accessible through your phone, helping you make the most of your time at University

Title: Research Information System (RIS)
Blurb: An easy-to-use web-based system designed to decrease the administrative burden of managing the research lifecycle.

Title: Campus Solutions
Blurb: Campus Solutions is used by staff to administer student records. Students also use the system (MyNottingham website) to apply to the University and update their details.
